TopicTitle: How do i get these into space?

Articles.Content:
I found these awesome trucks on the forum but I can't figure out a stable way to get them to the mun.

Original post

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37575-(0-21)-King-of-the-Road-Update](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37575-%280-21%29-King-of-the-Road-Update)

Put two of them on a rocket so they balance the load. Then all you need is something big enough to launch two of them ...

Or use the HyperEdit mod, which will just let you put them there instantly.
Either go the amazing and non-cheaty route of BIG LAUNCHER or use Hyperedit.
Is there any way to do it with a stock space plane?

> 
> Is there any way to do it with a stock space plane?

If by 'stock' you mean using only stock parts then, yes, it's possible. VERY hard but possible, spaceplanes are difficult at best and heavy-lift spaceplanes with an awkward payload particularly so.

If you mean using the 'stock' spaceplanes (Squad ships supplied in an install) then, no - they're just awful.
I meant the former. What style would I have to use because I was thinking of using a VTOL Dropship style plane using R.A.P.I.E.R. Engines.

My guess is you would use the hardest possible style, since you seem determined ^^.

Seriously - these trucks though cool are hard, spaceplanes are hard, heavy-lift spaceplanes are harder, VTOL is hard, rapiers are, well easy actually, but low-efficiency so make all the way to Mun is harder.

Have fun any way you want, but rocket was and is my recommendation.
Alright thanks for the input and I'll be sure to credit you in the video on my channel
